name: Parallel Investigation
description:
WASD - to move

E - to interact

gameplay link : youtubelink

Parallel Investigation is a small co-op puzzle horror game. Both you and your friend are stuck inside of a sewer system. Your goal is to complete two tasks to finish the game, but there seems to be certain entities present that don't want you to escape. If the player in "The Below" sewer moves, the entity in "The Above" sewer awakens, and vice versa. Are you and your friend able to complete the tasks without being caught in the allotted time frame, or will both of you end up lost forever?

 Complete the following tasks to win.
Task 1: Turn on all numbered switches in numeric order.
Task 2: Collect 20 scraps between the both of you. 

Sounds are from freesound.org
